playerstats.gameName: Age of Empires II: HD Edition

achievements.description: You have sought glory in ten single-player battles, fight on!
achievements.name: General

achievements.description: You have fought in one hundred single-player battles!
achievements.name: Centennial General

achievements.description: You have fought in one thousand single-player battles!  Even Alexander the Great did not have your strength of will.
achievements.name: Millennial General

achievements.description: Congratulations!  You have achieved the first multi-player victory of many to come.
achievements.name: First Victory

achievements.description: You have been victorious in fifty multi-player battles - you are a seasoned veteran and a worthy opponent!
achievements.name: Fifty Victories

achievements.description: It has probably been a long time since you stopped counting your battles and victories but your fans (and foes) will remember.  This battle marks your five hundredth multi-player victory!
achievements.name: Five Hundred Victories

achievements.description: On this day you have fought in your tenth online battle!  Let the town bell ring and the villagers rest from their labors that they may toast your good health and leadership.   There will be many battles ahead, some victories, some defeats - but always lessons.  Cheers and congratulations to you on this auspicious day!
achievements.name: Loyal Ally

achievements.description: Today is a day of glory!  You have fought one hundred battles versus fierce online opponents.  Three cheers for you - hip hip, HUZZAH!  HUZZAH!  HUZZAH!
achievements.name: Marking the First Hundred

achievements.description: Today is a day of great celebration!  You have fought your one thousandth battle against online opponents.  Order a feast!  Make a toast to those who have defeated you as honorable teachers, make a toast to those foes you have defeated, and most of all a toast to your friends and allies who have supported you in your many campaigns.
achievements.name: Day of a Thousand Stories

achievements.description: When you are ready to take on the unexpected you are ready to take on the world.  The Random map challenge is for any who are ready for attack or defense by land or sea and to defend against those who would threaten your empire.    Fight on!
achievements.name: First Random Map

achievements.description: You are master of the random map - from the thrill of exploration, to the skillful deployment of your villages, to the razing of the enemy and driving them from your borders.  Master of continents and oceans, your leadership is the stuff of song and legend!
achievements.name: One Hundred Random Maps

achievements.description: You have fought on every type of map, against every type of opponent in history.  There may be those who will still stand against you, but they do so with respect.  Huzzah!
achievements.name: Anytime, Anywhere

achievements.description: With turbo your villagers will gather and build quickly - pay attention to your resources and idle villagers. Turbo will let you focus more on your mid-game strategic planning.
achievements.name: The Quickening

achievements.description: Now that you have played twenty games at turbo you probably have a feel for the pace and challenges.  Focus on pushing your early attacks even earlier to surprise your enemy and interrupt their build momentum.
achievements.name: Gathering Speed

achievements.description: Deathmatch is a competition of fast decisions and instant action.  It will hone your skills at pitched battle.
achievements.name: First Deathmatch

achievements.description: Mastery of deathmatch is the ability to continuously make good decisions while building a sustainable economy under constant attacks.  You have demonstrated that ability by playing 50 games.
achievements.name: Deathmatch Master

achievements.description: After 300 battles if there is something to be learned in Deathmatch it is where to find opponents who will still agree to fight you.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: Deathmatch Legend

achievements.description: Each legendary leader has something to teach you, a tactic, a strategy, or an attitude - when you have fought their battles and studied their history you are taking steps to becoming a legendary leader yourself.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: A Taste of History

achievements.description: You have played your twentieth scenario, Congratulations!  What will the historians write about your battles?  Who were your greatest foes?  Were you more cunning or more bold?  Only time will tell.
achievements.name: Twenty Scenarios

achievements.description: You have played fifty scenarios - Wonderful!  Each conquered world reveals more lessons and more challenges ahead.  All great leaders build their knowledge on the foundation of the stories of the legends that have gone before.   Cheers to you!
achievements.name: Fifty Scenarios Completed

achievements.description: It isn’t taking the hill, it is holding it against all attackers that is the ultimate challenge. You are on your way.
achievements.name: King of the Hill

achievements.description: Life is short and brutal but legend is timeless, if you can master the strategies of King of the Hill you will be better prepared to take on anything that life throws at you.  You have battled the hill ten times, this will certainly not be the last.
achievements.name: Ten Hills

achievements.description: You have claimed one hundred hilltops!  The victor isn’t often the first one to the top, but the one that knows how to hold it once they are there.  You have demonstrated that knowledge.  Cheers to you!
achievements.name: One Hundred Hills

achievements.description: Wonder race is an exercise in building an economy quickly and efficiently - pay attention to balancing your economy and tasking those villagers and you will be victorious.
achievements.name: Peaceful Builder

achievements.description: By now you know the shortest path to building a wonder quickly - and how to build up your economy in a hurry.  Focus on optimizing your gathering technologies and economy to surprise your opponents.
achievements.name: Fifth Wonder Race

achievements.description: For many, the Wonder Race is a good way to learn how to tune an economy and know the short path to the Wonder for any civilization.  For you, the Wonder Race has its own appeal - a celebration of the empire builder’s art.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: Wonder Race Mastery

achievements.description: Wonder Defense is an excellent way for any leader to build their skills.  If you are defending then you must build your forces and reinforce your defensive structures quickly or attack offensively to reduce your opponent’s strength.  Attackers must be coordinated if they hope to succeed.
achievements.name: First Wonder Defense

achievements.description: Few things are so satisfying as seeing the enemy’s wonder in flames, or defending your wonder to the last unit.  After ten Defend the Wonder battles you have certainly seen both.  Cheers to you!
achievements.name: Builder and Destroyer

achievements.description: You have demonstrated mastery of the Defend the Wonder style.  Cheers to you on your fiftieth challenge!
achievements.name: Wonder Defender

achievements.description: You have earned your first MVP award.  The Most Valuable Player in an Age of Empires II battle has the highest total buildings razed and enemy units killed on the team.  Aggressive attacks and thorough elimination of enemy buildings will increase your chances of earning additional MVPs.   Congratulations!
achievements.name: You were the Most Valuable Player!

achievements.description: You have been selected for the Most Valuable Player award twenty times.  You have demonstrated great skill in battle, and surpassed that by outperforming the other generals in your allegiance.  You are definitely a rising star in this elite group.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: Rising Star

achievements.description: You have been selected for the Most Valuable Player award 100 times.  You have demonstrated great skill in battle, and surpassed that by outperforming the other generals in your allegiance.  You are definitely a rising star in this elite group.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: Incredible Team Leader!

achievements.description: After twenty five victories, you have shown that you truly can lead any civilization to glory.  You are truly a timeless commander!  (And you can probably converse with villagers in several languages.)

achievements.description: After a hundred victories playing random civilizations, your reputation is truly secure.  Any civilization, any era, any map.  Just bring it!
achievements.name: Random Civilization One Hundred Victories

achievements.description: You have now defeated the Huns one hundred times in battle!
achievements.name: Conqueror of the Huns

achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Koreans in battle.
achievements.name: Foe of the Koreans

achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Koreans.
achievements.name: Enemy of the Koreans

achievements.description: You have now defeated the Koreans one hundred times in battle!
achievements.name: Conqueror of the Koreans

achievements.description: You have faced the unknown!  Playing against random opponents will expose you to a world’s worth of variety of units, tactics, and technologies.  Study their strengths and weaknesses to become a great leader.
achievements.name: Mysterious Foes

achievements.description: You have defeated random opponents twenty five times. Your legend grows greater with every victory.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: Any Opponent

achievements.description: You have faced the random opponents and defeated them two hundred and fifty times.  No civilization can find safety when they stand against you.  Congratulations!
achievements.name: Random Master

achievements.description: You have won at least one victory against every civilization in Age of Empires II.
achievements.name: Master of all Civilizations

achievements.description: You have killed over fifty units in  a single session.
achievements.name: Skirmisher

achievements.description: You have killed over 500 units in a single session - your fame will spread from this point onward.
achievements.name: Commander

achievements.description: You have killed over two thousand units in a single session.  You are a legend to both allies and enemies.
achievements.name: Emperor

achievements.description: Sometimes to win battles you have to make hard choices and sacrifices.   In this battle you lost 25 units to combat with the enemy.  Sometimes an outdated unit can get a needed boost of speed or armor with the right technology.   Get used to watching the alerts on your mini-map as well - a second attack is easy to miss once you are defending the first one. Use this tactic to your advantage as well.
achievements.name: Just a flesh wound

achievements.description: Over one hundred of your units were lost in this battle - even with such great losses, if they were well used against the enemy you did the right thing.  Get used to studying the battle stats after each match with an opponent - did you have the right complementary mix of units?  Did you make your enemy pay for every one of your losses?  Every unit sacrificed is an opportunity to learn about your opponent.
achievements.name: And yet, I lived

achievements.description: Two hundred of your units were lost in this conflict.  Sadly, not every battle can be a sweeping victory where everyone returns to the feast table to boast of their skill.   Sometimes, being a good general is about knowing when to throw everything against the enemy without reservation or hesitation.  Today you know how that feels.
achievements.name: Massacre

achievements.description: Civilizations can be conquered with ideas as surely as with armaments.  You can celebrate your success this battle in converting enemy units.
achievements.name: Wololo - Enemy Unit Converted

achievements.description: The communication of ideas and religion was a powerful force that changed empires in the Middle Ages.  Your conquest of 20 enemies in a single battle shows great skill at deploying and protecting the priests.
achievements.name: Protecting the Priests

achievements.description: You have demonstrated mastery of the conversion strategies by converting over fifty enemy units in a single match.
achievements.name: Master of Conversion

achievements.description: You razed 50 buildings in this campaign, your enemies will think twice before challenging you again.
achievements.name: No Backing Down

achievements.description: In this campaign you razed over 100 buildings, your name is legend among your enemies.
achievements.name: Leave No Stone Unburned

achievements.description: No wall nor castle will stand in your way - you have clearly mastered the siege by razing over 250 buildings in one session.
achievements.name: Master of the Siege

achievements.description: For some leaders, losing 15 buildings in a single session would be a reason to retreat and resign.  Not you.
achievements.name: Live to Rebuild

achievements.description: For some leaders, losing 50 buildings in a single session would be a crushing defeat - as long as you have wood and villagers you will carry on.
achievements.name: Phoenix Rising

achievements.description: Some leaders might aspire to build one hundred buildings in their entire reign.  You lost that many this day and fought on valiantly.  Stay strong!
achievements.name: Live to Fight Another Day

achievements.description: You have constructed a wonder - a shining pinnacle of achievement for your civilization.  It is a beacon of hope to people everywhere, and if defended - a legacy of that achievement to stand the test of time.
achievements.name: Creation of your first Wonder of the World

achievements.description: Few leaders can master both the economy needed to construct a wonder, let alone build a strong military or alliances to defend it.  As a veteran of Five Wonders you have demonstrated those skills.
achievements.name: Five Wonders

achievements.description: One Wonder is a pinnacle achievement for any ruler.  You have constructed fifty Wonders of the World through your many campaigns through history.  Clearly you are a master of building a strong economy and support structure.  You are clearly a leader in the Age of Empires.
achievements.name: Will Wonders Never Cease?

achievements.description: The Castle was the premiere fortification of the Medieval period.  Your legacy  in the future is assured.
achievements.name: First Castle Constructed

achievements.description: In your various campaigns through history you have constructed over one hundred castles.
achievements.name: Century Castle Celebration

achievements.description: On this day you have created your thousand’th castle.  Huzzah!
achievements.name: One Thousand Castles

achievements.description: “We come here with no peaceful intent, but ready for battle, determined to avenge our wrongs and set our country free. Let your masters come and attack us: we are ready to meet them beard to beard.” - (1297) William Wallace
achievements.name: William Wallace Campaign Completed

achievements.description: “Of the love or hatred God has for the English, I know nothing, but I do know that they will all be thrown out of France, except those who die there.” - Joan of Arc (Trial 1431)
achievements.name: Joan of Arc Campaign Completed

achievements.description: By studying the campaigns of Salah al Din Yusuf ibn Ayyub, or 'Saladin' as he was known to the crusaders, you can know that there are many aspects to the great heroes of the Middle Ages. The lessons of his campaigns will guide you in your other conquests.
achievements.name: Saladin Campaign Completed

achievements.description: His enemies know only the ruthlessness and speed of the great Khan’s conquests - but the greatest generals also know the tools of cooperation, alliance, and loyalty - these will serve you well in future campaigns.
achievements.name: Genghis Khan Campaign Completed

achievements.description: In study of the campaigns of Frederick Barbarossa you learned the power of relics and of uniting an empire. Use this knowledge in your future conquests, but remember not to overextend yourself.
achievements.name: Frederick Barbarossa Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Attila knew both great betrayal and great glory in his conquests against the Romans. Attila said: “It takes less courage to criticize the decisions of others than to stand by your own.” - Carry his example on to your other campaigns.
achievements.name: Attila the Hun Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Throughout his conquests, El Cid was far more than a master at arms and noble, but was someone who could lead and unite the people. Even beyond his death, the legacy of his leadership was still more powerful than lesser rulers. Take his lessons with you on your own conquests.
achievements.name: El Cid Campaign Completed

achievements.description: By following along with Cuauhtémoc in the battles against Cortés you have used alliance building and subtlety in addition to your skills in battle. Skillful use of forces and alliances can overcome the greatest odds. Remember these lessons in your next conquest.
achievements.name: Montezuma Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Through study of these diverse battles and leaders you have mastered skills that will be useful in all of your future conquests. Fight with the piety of Charles Martel, the bravery of Alp Arslan, and the calculating tactics of Hideyoshi to ensure success in your campaigns.
achievements.name: Battles of the Conquerors Campaign Completed

achievements.description: You have successfully completed all of the story campaigns of Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings and Age of Empires II: The Conquerors Expansion. Successful leaders use many techniques to build their empires. Your careful study of the greatest of these men and women has given you new powers and abilities to build future empires.
achievements.name: Master of the Medieval World

achievements.description: You are an expert at the Turbo style, your decision-making under time pressure is legendary.  Congratulations to you, Lightning General!
achievements.name: Lightning General

achievements.description: You have led the Spanish to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.
achievements.name: Hero of the Spanish

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have defeated a single CPU opponent (at moderate difficulty or higher).
achievements.name: Humanity Victorious

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated two CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).
achievements.name: Two Challenging

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated three CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).
achievements.name: Triumphant Three

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated four CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).
achievements.name: Four Scored

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated five CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).
achievements.name: Five Golden Victories

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated six CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).  Not many can claim this level of skill.
achievements.name: Superior Six

achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated Seven CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).  World champions will often play against seven CPU opponents on Hard difficulty as a warm-up before tournaments.
achievements.name: Seven Sealed Fates

achievements.description: Every successful conversion is doubly beneficial to your team - you remove an enemy attacker and increase your own forces.  In your career you have successfully converted fifty units.
achievements.name: Power of Persuasion

achievements.description: Over the span of your career, you have successfully converted over five hundred of your enemies to your cause!
achievements.name: Embracing My Enemies

achievements.description: You have dedicated yourself to bringing your civilization's religion to your foes.  Very few generals have the patience and wisdom to manage the priest units so effectively as you have.  This is indeed a day of celebration - you have converted one thousand opposing units in your career.
achievements.name: Converting the World

achievements.description: You have crumbled your five hundredth building into rubble…and you are just getting warmed up.   Congratulations!
achievements.name: Burned

achievements.description: You have razed five thousand buildings in your long and illustrious military career!  If your reputation went up as quickly as you take buildings down you would be known world-wide.
achievements.name: Rubble Piles Everywhere

achievements.description: You have razed ten thousand buildings in your long and illustrious military career!  You can unpack trebuchets in your sleep and you consider a dozen fire archers a pleasant introduction.  You are a legend!
achievements.name: No Stone Left Standing

achievements.description: In your career you have lost over one thousand buildings.  Everything is a milestone, every win, every loss, and every building that falls.  Great generals count their losses and learn from them.
achievements.name: A Thousand Heaps of Rubble

achievements.description: In your career you have lost over ten thousand buildings.  Buildings, like miles spent on horseback are excruciating at first but just mark the passage of time before long.  If you celebrate with a cake, just put one candle on it and start working on your next ten thousand.
achievements.name: Ten Thousand Ruins

achievements.description: Sure, generals say that every unit lost is mourned and every building razed is avenged - but after fifty thousand even the most obsessive counter gives up.  You have seen civilizatons rise and fall endlessly - it is time to stop counting the buildings.   Congratulations that you persevere, mighty leader.
achievements.name: Time to Stop Counting Buildings

achievements.description: You hosted a multiplayer game for the first time!
achievements.name: Hosted First Game
Dark Ages Rush or Early Adopter

achievements.name: Champion of the Incas

achievements.name: Enemy of the Magyars

achievements.description: You have now defeated the Magyars one hundred times in battle!
achievements.name: Conqueror of the Magyars

achievements.name: Foe of the Slavs

achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Slavs.
achievements.name: Enemy of the Slavs

achievements.description: You have now defeated the Slavs one hundred times in battle!
achievements.name: Conqueror of the Slavs

achievements.description: Through toil and perseverance, you have found a new home for Alaric's people, showing even mighty Rome that the Goths are a force to be reckoned with. Use your migratory skills and resilience to find a new home, recover, and succeed in your future aims even when the present looks bleak.
achievements.name: Alaric Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Vlad Dracula was a harsh, sometimes cruel ruler, but one could not argue the success of his methods. The only man of his time able to stand against the might of the Ottomans, Vlad showed that patriotism, charisma, and proper tactics could overcome all odds. Vlad also made a point to be strict but fair. Remember that advice when ruling your empire.
achievements.name: Dracula Campaign Completed

achievements.description: The Nautikos family valued its home greatly, and its family history and heritage instilled a drive in its heirs to bring glory to their house. Their exploits, though somewhat forgotten, are a source of pride to their descendants. That pride is a fine attribute, but it is best tempered with prudence and ethic. Take that advice on your future conquests.
achievements.name: Bari Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Rising from a lowly soldier to Duke of Milan, Sforza did more than make his father’s spirit proud. Use the traits of military leadership and tactics that you have learned in this campaign to find success in your future battles, and remember that it is better to be feared than loved. - Machiavelli (The Prince 1513)
achievements.name: Sforza Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Orellana and his loyal followers faced more than their own fears and superstitions on their navigation of the Amazon. To overcome the adversity that stood in their way, they had to work as a unit and not as individuals. Remember those principles of unity and selflessness on your future campaigns.
achievements.name: El Dorado Campaign Completed

achievements.description: The subject of veneration of many of his descendants, Prithviraj was shrewd, brave, honest, but also prone to emotion, taking many risks for the sake of love. Even in the sight of war and possible death, remember to enjoy your life to the fullest, for you only live once. A complete and moral life deserves the most remembrance.
achievements.name: Prithviraj Campaign Completed

achievements.description: Through your inquiry into the detail of some of the less-known but equally significant historical clashes of arms, you have shown that you are truly a master of the pen and the sword. Rule with the strength of the sons of Ragnar, the diplomatic aptitude of Khosrau Anushirvan, the steadfastness of Minamoto no Yoritomo, and the charisma of Osman Ghazi.
achievements.name: Battles of the Forgotten Campaign Completed

achievements.description: You have successfully completed all of the story campaigns of Age of Empires II: The Forgotten Expansion. Through your trials and successes in these clashes of arms, you surely have mastered all spheres of empire-building and rule, and are ready to start building your own legend. “Cattle die, kindred die, every man is mortal: But the good name never dies of one who has done well.” -Havamal (Poetic Edda 1220)
achievements.name: Master of the Forgotten World

achievements.description: Finished the game, vanquished evil, and the hero got the girl.

achievements.description: Equip the Golden AK.762 rifle. Celebrating 500,000 heisters in the official community group, you can now unlock the Golden AK.762 rifle by simply joining the PAYDAY 2 Official Group on Steam.
achievements.name: Build Me an Army Worthy of Crime.net

achievements.description: Kill 6 Skulldozers using only the golden AK.762 rifle.
achievements.name: The Man With the Golden Gun

achievements.description: Perform 50 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the “Asilidae” mask, “Carapace” material and “Bugger” pattern.
achievements.name: Lord of the Flies

achievements.description: Perform 100 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the “Tarantula” mask, “Insectoid” material and “Spider Eyes” pattern.
achievements.name: Arachne’s Curse

achievements.description: Perform 250 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the “Vespula” mask, “Bug Shell” material and “Venomous” pattern.
achievements.name: Pest Control

achievements.description: Perform 500 headshot kills using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the “Sphodromantis” mask, “Hard Shell” material and “Wings of Death” pattern.
achievements.name: Seer of Death

achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies from 40 meters using only the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle. Unlocks the Tank Buster Barrel for the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Far, Far Away

achievements.description: Perform a headshot kill on enemies using only the R93 sniper rifle while zip lining. Unlocks the Compensated Suppressor for the R93 sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Last Action Villain

achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies with one bullet using any sniper rifle. Unlocks the Angled sight for all sniper rifles.
achievements.name: Triple Kill

achievements.description: Kill 10 Shields by shooting through their shields using only the R93 sniper rifle. Unlocks the Short Barrel for the R93 sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Maximum Penetration

achievements.description: Perform 10 headshot kills on Cloakers using only the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle. Unlocks the Suppressed Barrel for the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Dodge This

achievements.description: Kill 10 Bulldozers using only the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle. Unlocks the CQB Barrel for the Thanatos .50 cal sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Surprise Motherfucker

achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies using any sniper rifle while zip lining. Unlocks the Theia Magnified Scope for all sniper rifles.
achievements.name: Didn’t See That Coming Did You?

achievements.description: Kill 25 Snipers using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the Tactical Aluminium Body for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.
achievements.name: A Taste of Their Own Medicine

achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies shooting through walls or objects using only the R93 sniper rifle. Unlocks the Wooden Body for the R93 sniper rifle.
achievements.name: You Can’t Hide

achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies with one bullet 25 times using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the Sniper Suppressor for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Double Kill

achievements.description: Kill 250 enemies using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the Long Barrel for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.
achievements.name: Public Enemy No. 1

achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 4 bags of loot.
achievements.name: I Will Fade to Dark

achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure at least 6 bags of loot and without killing anyone.
achievements.name: I Will Pass Through Walls

achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure a piece of every available type of loot, including money, gold, cocaine, artifact, painting, weapons and server.
achievements.name: I Will Take With Impunity

achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure all 4 pieces of the samurai armor. Unlocks the “Somen Mempo” mask.
achievements.name: I Will Walk Faceless Among Men

achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 16 bags of random loot and all 4 pieces of the samurai armor.
achievements.name: I Am Ninja

achievements.description: Complete the Shadow Raid job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: I Will Die and Die, and Die Again

achievements.description: Hack the correct computer on the first try in The Big Bank job. Unlocks the “The First American” mask, the "Parchment" material, the "Roman" pattern and the Tactical Grip for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: It Takes Two to Tango

achievements.description: Drop Floyd the pig on top of a lawforcer. Unlocks the “The 1st” mask, the "Exhausted" material, the "Ruler" pattern and the Extended Magazine for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: It Takes a Pig to Kill a Pig

achievements.description: Complete The Big Bank job with 16 secured bags. Unlocks the “The 16th” mask, the "Clay" material, the "Spartan" pattern and the Marksman Foregrip for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: Sweet Sixteen

achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist in under 12 minutes on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the Wooden Foregrip for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: 12 Angry Minutes

achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm. Unlocks the CQB Stock for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: Don't Bring the Heat

achievements.description: Bring Bobblehead Bob to the vault. Unlocks the “The 18th” mask, the "Gemstone" material, the "God of War" pattern and the Wooden Stock for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: Backing Bobblehead Bob

achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist with 12 bags in the default escape with all the lasers active. Unlocks the CQB Foregrip for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: Entrapment

achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, start the Big Bank job after having spent all 10 favors in Preplanning. Unlocks the Retro Foregrip for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: You Owe Me One

achievements.description: Complete the Big Bank job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Don't Forget to Floss

achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Big Bank" mask each. Unlocks the Marksman Stock for the Falcon rifle.
achievements.name: Funding Father

achievements.description: Beat a Shield to death using the Telescopic Baton.
achievements.name: Police Brutality

achievements.description: Own the Locomotive, Street Sweeper, Reinfeld, Mosconi, Izhma, Raven and M1014 Shotguns. Unlocks the Flip-up Sight for the Raven shotgun.
achievements.name: Lock, Stock & Eight Smoking Barrels

achievements.description: Complete any single day of a heist, killing at least 50 enemies using only your melee weapon.
achievements.name: Swing Dancing

achievements.description: Get 7 enemy headshot kills within 11 seconds using any shotgun. Unlocks the Short Barrel for the M1014 shotgun, “John” mask, “Explosive” material and “Terror” pattern.
achievements.name: Seven Eleven

achievements.description: Complete any heist by killing at least 50 enemies and getting 101% accuracy or above using any shotgun. Unlocks the Long Barrel for the M1014 shotgun.
achievements.name: Shotgun 101

achievements.description: Kill 50 Shields using any shotgun and slug ammo. Unlocks the Collapsed Stock for the M1014 shotgun.
achievements.name: Knock, Knock

achievements.description: On the Night Club heist, kill 25 law enforcers using your shovel. Unlocks the Short Barrel for the Raven shotgun.
achievements.name: Everyday I’m Shovelin'

achievements.description: Kill 10 snipers using any shotgun and flechette ammo. Unlocks the Long Barrel for the Raven shotgun, "Clint" mask, "Leaf" material and "Monkey Skull" pattern.
achievements.name: Clay Pigeon Shooting

achievements.description: Hit 4 enemies simultaneously using any shotgun and HE rounds. Unlocks the Solid Stock for the M1014 shotgun.
achievements.name: Shock and Awe

achievements.description: Kill 10 Bulldozers using any shotgun and 000 buckshot ammo. Unlocks the Long Barrel for the Street Sweeper shotgun, "Steven" mask, "Sparks" material and "Chief" pattern.
achievements.name: Bang for the Buck

achievements.description: Complete any day of a heist in stealth with a Locomotive 12G shotgun modified with the "Silent Killer Suppressor" equipped. Unlocks the Suppressed Barrel for the Street Sweeper shotgun, "Rutger" mask, "Banana Peel" material and "Banana" pattern.
achievements.name: No Heist for Old Men

achievements.description: In the Rats job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Shotgun Pack" mask each on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Four Monkeys

achievements.description: Kill 25 Bulldozers using the Gewehr 3 Rifle. Unlocks the Sniper Barrel for the Clarion rifle, Sniper Stock, Sniper Grip and Sniper Foregrip for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, Precision Stock, Precision Grip and the DMR Kit for the Gewehr 3 rifle as well as the “Black Death” mask.
achievements.name: Precision Aiming

achievements.description: Kill at least four enemies with one GL40 grenade launcher shot. Unlocks the Sawed-off Stock for the GL40 grenade launcher and the “Crow Goblin” mask.
achievements.name: Big Bada Boom

achievements.description: Equip the GL40 grenade launcher, the Locomotive 12G shotgun and the Improved Combined Tactical Vest. Unlocks the CQB Foregrip and Plastic Stock for the Gecko 7.62 rifle.
achievements.name: Army of One

achievements.description: Own one of every Gage Assault Pack weapon in the game. Unlocks the Short Barrel for the Clarion rifle, Light Stock for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, Plastic Foregrip and Assault Kit for the Gewehr 3 rifle, “Evil” material and “Vicious” pattern.
achievements.name: So Many Choices

achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies at 40 meters or more using only the GL40 grenade launcher. Unlocks the Wooden Stock for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, Pirate Barrel for the GL40 grenade launcher, “Bone” material and “Muerte” pattern.
achievements.name: Artillery Barrage

achievements.description: In the Watchdogs job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different Assault Pack mask each on OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the Light Foregrip for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, Tactical Foregrip for the Gewehr 3 rifle, Long Barrel for the Clarion rifle, “Void” material and “Death” pattern.
achievements.name: Unusual Suspects

achievements.description: Kill a jumping Cloaker using the GL40 grenade launcher. Unlocks the Wooden Stock, Retro Grip and Wooden Foregrip for the Gewehr 3 rifle.
achievements.name: Not Today

achievements.description: Kill 25 thugs using the Ding Dong breaching tool melee weapon. Unlocks the “Frost” material and “Emperor” pattern.
achievements.name: Hammertime

achievements.description: Kill 10 Cloakers using the Gecko 7.62 rifle. Unlocks the Skeletal Stock, Fabulous Stock and Fabulous Foregrip for the Gecko 7.62 rifle as well as the “Volt” mask.
achievements.name: Rabbit Hunting

achievements.description: Kill 200 enemies using the Clarion rifle. Unlocks the Suppressed Barrel and G2 Grip for the Clarion rifle as well as the “Professor Wrath” mask.
achievements.name: Tour de Clarion

achievements.description: Complete the Hotline Miami job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Wrong Number

achievements.description: In day two of the Hotline Miami job, reach the Commissar’s apartment in under 210 seconds on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the Rasmus mask, Tactical Foregrip and the Ergonomic Stock for the Uzi submachine gun, “Chromescape” material and "Palmtrees" pattern.
achievements.name: Walk Faster

achievements.description: In the Hotline Miami job, kill 30 thugs with the Baseball Bat. Unlocks the Dennis mask, Solid Stock for the Uzi submachine gun, Wooden Grip for the Cobra submachine gun, "Rubber" material and "Hip to Be Polygon" pattern.
achievements.name: Do You Like Hurting Other People?

achievements.description: Cook and secure six bags of meth on day one of the Hotline Miami job. Unlocks the Graham mask, Ghetto Blaster, Extended Mag and Just Bend It for the Blaster 9mm submachine gun, "Error" material and "Be Somebody" pattern.
achievements.name: Overdose

achievements.description: In the Hotline Miami job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different Hotline Miami mask each on hard or above. Unlocks the Silent Death and Folded Stock for the Uzi submachine gun, Suppressor and No Stock for the Cobra submachine gun and Short Barrel for the Blaster 9mm submachine gun.
achievements.name: Sounds of Animals Fighting

achievements.description: On day two of the Hotline Miami job, save someone in need. Unlocks the Aubrey mask, Ergo Grip, Extended Mag and Unfolded Stock for the Cobra submachine gun, "Sunset" material and "Doodles" pattern.
achievements.name: Phew!

achievements.description: Complete the Art Gallery heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: State of the Art

achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Breakout heist on any difficulty. Unlocks "Hoxton" as a playable character and the "Nova's Shank" melee weapon.
achievements.name: Why Don’t We Just Use a Spoon?

achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Breakout heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: No Bars Can Hold Me

achievements.description: Hurt an enemy using the Nova's Shank melee weapon.
achievements.name: Cavity

achievements.description: This is a secret achievement. It is only obtainable during the Annual Halloween Event!
achievements.name: Sixth Nightmare

achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies as they rappel using the Nagant sniper rifle. Unlocks the Constable mask, the Silenced Barrel and the Long Barrel for the Nagant sniper rifle, “Gunsmoke” material and “Dazzle” pattern.
achievements.name: Death From Below

achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies while in stealth using the Trench knife. Unlocks the Red Bear mask, Short Barrel, Suppressed Barrel, Short Mag, Folded Stock, No Stock, Solid Stock, Heatsinked Suppressed Barrel for the Patchett L2A1 submachine gun, Barrel Sight 44, Damper.L 44 Nozzle for the Broomstick pistol, “Red Sun” material and “Death Dealer” pattern.
achievements.name: Special Operations Execution

achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Historical" mask each on OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the Discrete Stock and Short Barrel for the Nagant sniper rifle, Precision Barrel for the Broomstick pistol, Extended Mag and Long Barrel for the Patchett L2A1 submachine gun and the Heatsinked Suppressed Barrel for the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun.
achievements.name: Wind of Change

achievements.description: Equip a Broomstick pistol with the Damper.L 44 Nozzle and the Barrel Sight 44. Unlocks the British Bulldog mask, High Capacity Mag and Holster Stock for the Broomstick pistol, "Army Green" material and "Filthy Thirteen" pattern.
achievements.name: So Uncivilized

achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies within 10 seconds using the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun. Unlocks the Old Blood and Guts mask, Light Barrel for the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun, "Patriot" material and "Captain War" pattern.
achievements.name: Bullet Hell

achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Normal difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Mrs. Claus" mask.
achievements.name: Vlad's Little Helpers

achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Strinch" mask.
achievements.name: Stealing Christmas

achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Very Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Krampus" mask.
achievements.name: Cancelling Santa's Christmas

achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Mechanical Santa" mask.
achievements.name: Claustrophobia

achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Like Turkeys Voting for an Early Christmas

achievements.description: In the White Xmas job, complete the heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above while each crew member wear a different "2014 Xmas" mask each. Unlocks the "Almir's Beard" mask.
achievements.name: Riders On the Snowstorm

achievements.description: In the White Xmas job, secure the rare Almir's Toast.
achievements.name: Impossible, It Can't Be. Is It?

achievements.description: Complete the Diamond job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Devil of a Job

achievements.description: In the Diamond job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm. Unlocks "The Cursed One" mask, "Sand" material and "Hieroglyphs" pattern.
achievements.name: Cat Burglar

achievements.description: In the Diamond job, secure 10 bags of additional loot. Unlocks the "Medusa" mask, "Rusting Metal" material and "Runes" pattern.
achievements.name: Culture Vultures

achievements.description: In the Diamond job, steal the Diamond and escape in under 10 minutes. Unlocks the "Pazuzu" mask, "Diamond" material and "Horus" pattern.
achievements.name: Smoke and Mirrors

achievements.description: In the Diamond job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Diamond heist" mask each on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Honor Among Thieves

achievements.description: In the Diamond job, complete the heist, diamond puzzle and steal the Diamond after the alarm has been triggered on OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Anubis" mask, "Mummy Bandages" material and "Hawk Helm" pattern.
achievements.name: Diamonds in the Rough

achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist on OVERKILL difficulty or above with each crew member using no skills, wearing suits, wielding Golden AK.762 rifles and Chicago Typewriter submachine guns. Unlocks a new skill slot.
achievements.name: Tabula Rasa

achievements.description: Knock out a Bulldozer using the OVERKILL boxing gloves. Unlocks "The Champ" mask.
achievements.name: Knockout!

achievements.description: Complete the Bomb: Forest heist on Normal difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Derailed

achievements.description: Complete the Bomb: Forest heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: A Pine in the Ass

achievements.description: In the Bomb: Forest heist, cut down all trees within 5 seconds. Unlocks the "Butcher From Hell" mask, "Meat" material and "Pleter" pattern.
achievements.name: Beaver Team

achievements.description: In the Bomb: Forest heist, do not let the cops disconnect the water hose while you are using the river water pump. Unlocks the "Tech Lion" mask, "Marble Rock" material and "Lion Game Lion" pattern.
achievements.name: Pump It Up

achievements.description: Finish the Bomb: Forest heist without letting any civilian flee or die, having at least five civilians in the heist, while escaping with the boat. Unlocks "The Doctor" mask, "Plywood" material and "Caduceus" pattern.
achievements.name: Oppressor

achievements.description: Complete the Bomb: Dockyard heist on any difficulty.
achievements.name: Maiden Voyage

achievements.description: Complete the Bomb: Dockyard heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Fisherman's Fiend

achievements.description: Complete the Bomb: Dockyard heist in stealth on the Death Wish difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Lady Butcher" mask, "Rhino" material and "Checker Board" pattern.
achievements.name: Sneaking With the Fishes

achievements.description: In the Bomb: Dockyard heist, find the meth lab. Unlocks the "Extended Mag" for the LEO pistol.
achievements.name: Breaking Dead

achievements.description: In the Bomb: Dockyard heist, don't let the enemies cut the power. Unlocks the "Long Slide" for the LEO pistol.
achievements.name: I've Got the Power

achievements.description: In the Bomb: Dockyard heist, open the dock gate in 60 seconds using the keycards. Unlocks the "Custom Slide" for the LEO pistol.
achievements.name: Done in 60 Seconds

achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, complete the heist on any difficulty with each crew member using the OVE 9000 saw as primary and secondary weapons. Unlocks the "THRUST Upper Receiver", "THRUST Lower Receiver" and "Long Ergo Foregrip" for the CAR weapon family.
achievements.name: OVE SAW 72000

achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, have 12 hostages or more on the dance floor when you escape. Unlocks the "Aluminum Grip" for the AK weapon family, the "Aluminum Foregrip" for the Krinkov submachine gun and the "LW Upper Receiver" for the CAR weapon family.
achievements.name: Hey Mr. DJ

achievements.description: In the Mallcrasher job, loot $1,800,000 in loose cash within 50 seconds of starting the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty. Unlocks the "Scope Mount" and "PBS Suppressor" for the AK weapon family, "Alfred" mask, "Dawn" material and "Dinosaur Skull" pattern.
achievements.name: $1.8M Speedrun

achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete the heist on OVERKILL difficulty or above, with all days done in loud and with a crew of 4 players using unmodified "AK Rifle" rifles and "PARA" submachine guns. Unlocks the "DMR Kit AK.762" and the "Low Drag Magazine" for the AK weapon family, "Timothy" mask, "Prehistoric" material and "Dinosaur Stripes" pattern.
achievements.name: Here Comes the Pain Train

achievements.description: In the Art Gallery job, kill two of the patrolling guards in stealth in the bathroom. Unlocks the "E.M.O. Foregrip" and the "OVAL Foregrip" for the CAR weapon family and the "Aftermarket Shorty" for the PARA submachine gun.
achievements.name: The Wolf Lures You to Your Grave

achievements.description: In the Art Gallery job, complete the heist in stealth within 4 minutes with each crew member wearing the Improved Combined Tactical Vest and no Armor Kit deployable equipped. Unlocks the "Classic Stock" for the AK weapon family, "2 Piece Stock" for the AK and CAR weapon families, "Pachy" mask, "Fossil" material and "Prehistoric Predator" pattern.
achievements.name: The Turtle Always Wins

achievements.description: In the Jewelry store job, don't let the cops enter the jewelry store until the van comes back on OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "DMR Kit AMR-16" and the "L5 Magazine" for the CAR weapon family, "Vincent" mask, "Feathers" material and "Dinosaur Scars" pattern.
achievements.name: Private Party

achievements.description: Kill 100 cops using only weapons from the AK or CAR weapon families. Unlocks the "Keymod Rail", the "Crabs Rail" and the "Modern Barrel" for the AK weapon family.
achievements.name: The Collector

achievements.description: Reach the sixth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Villainous

achievements.description: Reach the seventh level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Abominable

achievements.description: Reach the eighth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Fiendish

achievements.description: Reach the ninth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Heinous

achievements.description: Reach the tenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Mean

achievements.description: Reach the eleventh level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Dangerous

achievements.description: Reach the twelfth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Fearless

achievements.description: Reach the thirteenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Nefarious

achievements.description: Reach the fourteenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Disreputable

achievements.description: Reach the fifteenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Fearful

achievements.description: Reach the sixteenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Opprobrious

achievements.description: Reach the seventeenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Shady

achievements.description: Reach the eighteenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Savage

achievements.description: Reach the nineteenth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Abhorrent

achievements.description: Reach the twentieth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Sly

achievements.description: Reach the twenty first level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Crafty

achievements.description: Reach the twenty second level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Shameless

achievements.description: Reach the twenty third level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Diabolical

achievements.description: Reach the twenty fourth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Ferocious

achievements.description: Reach the twenty fifth level of infamy.
achievements.name: Becoming Monstrous

achievements.description: Complete the Rats job with you and your four man crew having Combined Tactical Vests, Vulcan Miniguns, HRL-7 Rocket Launchers and General Overkill masks equipped on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Cooking With Style

achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, complete the heist in stealth while having the Vulcan Minigun and HRL-7 Rocket Launcher equipped.
achievements.name: I Have No Idea What I'm Doing

achievements.description: Fire the Vulcan Minigun for 25 seconds without reloading or letting go of the trigger.
achievements.name: Oh, That’s How You Do It

achievements.description: Complete the Watchdogs job with each crew member using no skills, wielding the AMCAR Rifle and Chimano 88 Pistol on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: We Are Rockstars On This Job

achievements.description: In the Breaking Ballot heist in the Election Day job, complete the heist with you and your four man crew without letting anyone get downed, cloaked or cuffed on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Reputation Beyond Reproach

achievements.description: In the Big Oil job, complete day one in stealth on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: House Keeping

achievements.description: Kill 120 or more enemies in any day in a heist, with you and your four man crew having at least 120% crew accuracy at the end of the heist.
achievements.name: 120 Proof

achievements.description: Complete the Big Oil job, with at least one other player, all using suits and Akimbo Bernetti 9 Pistols on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Boston Saints

achievements.description: On any day of a heist, have four law enforcers converted at the same time on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Bring Your Cop To Work Day

achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete day one having burned all weapons on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Wasteful

achievements.description: On day 1 of the Election Day job, tag the right truck and leave within a minute of the start of the heist.
achievements.name: Speedlock Holmes

achievements.description: Answer 4 pagers by yourself within 90 seconds from first to last pager.
achievements.name: Nothing Out of the Ordinary

achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete day 2 without using a single keycard on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Situation Normal

achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, zip-tie the DJ and bring him to the escape zone by the escape van.
achievements.name: Keep the Party Going

achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete day 3 with you and your crew staying inside the vault while all of the money burns out on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: It's Getting Hot in Here

achievements.description: Complete the Cook Off job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: Cooking By the Book

achievements.description: In the Car Shop job, be the first player in a four man crew to reach the docks.
achievements.name: Tag, You're It!

achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Revenge job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: A Dish Best Served Cold

achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Revenge job without triggering the alarm.
achievements.name: Silent But Deadly

achievements.description: In the Car Shop job, complete the heist within 4 minutes. Unlocks the "The Tids" mask.
achievements.name: Gone in 240 Seconds

achievements.description: Kill the traitor.
achievements.name: I'm An Avenger!

achievements.description: Complete the Car Shop heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: High Octane

achievements.description: Enter a drivable vehicle.
achievements.name: Pink Slip

achievements.description: Have 10 enemies burning simultaneously. Unlocks the "Graug" mask, "Coal" material and "Fireborn" pattern.
achievements.name: Disco Inferno

achievements.description: Set an enemy on fire and kill him with the "Motherforker" melee weapon. Unlocks the "The Gas Mask" mask, "Candlelight" material and "Flammable" pattern.
achievements.name: Stick a Fork in Me, I'm Done

achievements.name: Not Invited

achievements.description: Set a Bulldozer on fire for at least 10 seconds. Unlocks the "The Chef" mask, "Toast" material and "Hot Flames" pattern.
achievements.name: OVERGRILL

achievements.description: Pick up 100 arrows. Unlocks the "Desert Skull" mask, "Western Sunset" material and "Mystical" pattern.
achievements.name: Recycling

achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies at the same time with the Dynamite. Unlocks the "Wild West Classic" mask, "Cactus" material and "Coyote" pattern.
achievements.name: The Nobel Prize

achievements.description: Get 10 or more arrows stuck in a Bulldozer at the same time. Unlocks the "Lone Heister" mask, "Scorpion" material and "Totem" pattern.
achievements.name: Hedgehog

achievements.description: Kill 6 law enforcers within 6 seconds of killing the first while hipfiring with the Peacemaker .45 Revolver. Unlocks the "Apache Mystic" mask, "Gold Fever" material and "Sacred" pattern.
achievements.name: Fastest Gun in the West

achievements.description: Complete the Meltdown job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.description: Complete the Meltdown job.
achievements.name: Sunday Drive

achievements.description: In the Meltdown job, secure all additional loot. Unlocks the "Rad Mutant" mask.
achievements.name: They Don’t Pay Us Enough

achievements.description: In the Meltdown job, complete the heist without using the "Longfellow".
achievements.name: There Was a Car?!

achievements.description: Complete the Alesso Heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: We Built This City on Electric Progressive House Music

achievements.description: Complete the Alesso Heist without your crew killing anyone. Unlocks the "Boom Box" mask, "Enlightenment" material and "Alesso Logo" pattern.
achievements.name: Sound of Silence

achievements.description: In the Alesso heist job, get your seven bucks back. Unlocks the "Cantus" mask, "Bionic" material and "Circle Raster" pattern.
achievements.name: Even Steven

achievements.description: In the Alesso Heist job, complete the heist in loud without using the zip-line or bag chutes on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Female Concert Goer" mask, "Stained Glass" material and "Soundwave" pattern.
achievements.name: Fuck It, We're Walking

achievements.description: In the Alesso Heist job, complete the pyro sequences without failing even once. Unlocks the "Male Concert Goer" mask, "Dim Blue" material and "Smoke" pattern.
achievements.name: M.F. Stev

achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job  on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
achievements.name: How the Fuck Can You Grin?

achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino heist in stealth. Unlocks the "Wheeler Dealer" mask, "Stars" material and "Chips" pattern.
achievements.name: Blind Eye in the Sky

achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino heist without having the Big Fucking Drill ever break in loud. Unlocks the "Murmillo Galea Helmet" mask, "Casino" material and "Royale" pattern.
achievements.name: City of Sin and Well-Oiled Gears

achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino heist under 14 minutes. Unlocks the "The King" mask, "Plush" material and "Cards" pattern.
achievements.name: High Roller

achievements.description: In the Golden Grin Casino heist, kill "The King" and complete the heist in stealth. Unlocks the "Sports Utility Mask" mask, "Carpet" material and "Dices" pattern.
achievements.name: Hail to the King, Baby

achievements.description: Get eleven kills with the Lebensauger .308 Sniper Rifle without reloading it. Unlocks the "Slicer" mask, "Still Waters" material and "Youkai" pattern.
achievements.name: Names Are for Friends, so I Don't Need One

achievements.description: Kill 100 enemies in a single day of a heist with the Kross Vertex Submachine Gun. Unlocks the "Kage" mask, "Sakura" material and "Oni" pattern.

achievements.description: Kill 10 shields with a Gage Chivalry Pack melee weapon in a single heist. Unlocks the "Agatha Vanguard Veteran" mask, "Chain Armor" material and "Medieval" pattern.
achievements.name: Their Armor Is Thick and Their Shields Broad

achievements.description: Kill a Cloaker with the Javelin throwable. Unlocks the "Mason Knight Veteran" mask, "Scale Armor" material and "Mason" pattern.

Finish the First World Bank job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above by securing all additional money bags while not using the loot vent bag shortcut for the additional money bags.

achievements.description: Complete the First World Bank heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

achievements.description: Complete the Slaughterhouse job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
